movies.title: Carrie
movies.synopsis: Carrie White, a shy, friendless teenage girl who is sheltered by her domineering, religious mother, unleashes her telekinetic powers after being humiliated by her classmates at her senior prom.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name
movies.funfact: While speaking at a book event in Fort Myers, Florida in 2010, Stephen King recalled that he was paid just $2,500 for the movie rights to Carrie (1976), which may seem like a pittance, but he has no regrets, as he feels he was lucky to have that happen to his first book.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.synopsis: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name
movies.funfact: Stephen King was quite disappointed in the final film. While admitting that Stanley Kubrick's visuals were stunning, he said that was surface and not substance. He often described the film as "A fancy car without an engine.

movies.title: Creepshow
movies.synopsis: An anthology which tells five terrifying tales based on the E.C. horror comic books of the 1950s.
movies.literature: based on the King short stories Weeds and The Crate, the rest is original work for the film
movies.funfact: Stephen King carried a toy figure of the character Greedo from Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977) on the Creepshow set for good luck.

movies.title: Cujo
movies.synopsis: Cujo, a friendly St. Bernard, contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name
movies.screenplay: Don Carlos Dunaway and Lauren Currier

movies.title: The Dead Zone
movies.synopsis: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic ability.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name

movies.title: Christine
movies.synopsis: A nerdish boy buys a strange car with an evil mind of its own and his nature starts to change to reflect it.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name

movies.title: Children of the Corn
movies.synopsis: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name

movies.title: Firestarter
movies.synopsis: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.
movies.literature: based on the King novel of the same name

movies.title: Cat's Eye
movies.synopsis: A stray cat is the linking element of three tales of suspense and horror.
movies.literature: based on the short stories Quitters, Inc. and The Ledge, the rest is original work for the film

movies.title: Silver Bullet
movies.synopsis: A werewolf terrorizes a small city where lives the paralytic Marty Coslaw, his uncle, and his sister, the story's narrator.
movies.literature: Based on the short novel Cycle of the Werwolf

movies.title: Maximum Overdrive
movies.synopsis: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.
movies.literature: based on the short story Trucks

movies.title: Stand By Me
movies.synopsis: AAfter the death of one of his friends, a writer recounts a boyhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.
movies.literature: based on the novella The Body
